alert.note: Alert for Bronx; New York (Manhattan); Richmond (Staten Is.); Southern Westchester (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 17 at 3:28AM EST until December 18 at 12:00PM EST by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO NOON EST MONDAY... * WHAT...Southeast winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...In Connecticut, Northern Fairfield, Northern New Haven and Northern Middlesex Counties. In New Jersey, Hudson County. In New York, Southern Westchester, New York (Manhattan), Bronx and Richmond (Staten Island) Counties. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to noon EST Monday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Bronx; New York (Manhattan); Richmond (Staten Is.); Southern Westchester
